## Analysis of Processed Data Using the Rate Expression as the Model

{{< include problem_statement.qmd >}}

---

$$
r_1 = \frac{1}{V} \frac{dn_A}{dt} = \frac{dC_A}{dt} \approx \frac{\Delta C_A}{\Delta t} \tag{3}
$$

if $t_i = 5 \text{ min}$

$$
r_{1,i} \approx \frac{C_{A,i} - C_{A,0,i}}{t_i - 0} = \frac{C_{A,i} - C_{A,0,i}}{t_i} \tag{4}
$$

otherwise

$$
r_{1,i} \approx \frac{C_{A,i} - C_{A,i-1}}{t_i - t_{i-1}} \tag{5}
$$

response function

$$
r_{1,i,\text{model}} = k_{0,1} \exp \left( \frac{-E_1}{RT_i} \right) C_{A,i} \tag{6}
$$
